sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function ProductCard({ obj, style }) { return ( <> {style?.display === "flex" ? (

{obj?.title}

Rating: {obj?.rating}

{obj?.description}

  • Stock:

    {obj?.stock}

  • Brand:

    {obj?.brand}

{obj?.price} USD
) : (

{obj?.title}

{obj?.description}

{obj?.price} USD
)} ); } export default ProductCard;
